entities.name: he
entities.description: The person being hugged, introduced as the one who saved someone.

entities.name: you
entities.description: The person doing the hugging, referred to as the one who saved someone.

entities.name: it
entities.description: Something that was prevented from happening due to the actions of 'you'.

relationships.description: The speaker is expressing gratitude towards 'you' for saving someone, implying a positive relationship between 'you' and 'he'. The text states 'I don’t know what would have happened if it hadn’t been for you', indicating that the actions of 'you' prevented something negative from occurring.
